title: Sing
lyrics: -once -2x -once -2x/mute It's late in the evening Ignoring everybody here I don't wanna know To hold your body close I need you darling, come on set the tone Oh oh oh, oh oh If you love me come on get involved Oh oh oh, oh oh Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh, Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh- Sing! This love is a blaze Let it go until I wrote the change I told her my name, I said it's nice to meet ya Then she handed me a bottle o' water filled with tequila Deep if anybody finds out I'm meant to drive home I need you darling, come on set the tone Oh oh oh, oh oh If you love me come on get involved Oh oh oh, oh oh Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh, Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh- Sing! Can you feel it? Can you feel it? Found you hiding here so hoped you take my hand, darlin' Can you feel it? (2x) Oooooo oh oh (2x) Can you feel it? (2x) Ooooo no no no (2x) whoa.. Sing! I need you darling, come on set the tone Oh oh oh, oh oh If you love me come on get involved Oh oh oh, oh oh Oh oh oh, oh oh... Sing!
